metadata.name: Bulletproof Hearts
metadata.description:
A "bulletproof heart" would manifest as an enigmatic paradox â€” a shield against the piercing arrows of vulnerability and pain, yet a prison that isolates the soul from the profound connections that make us undeniably human. 
It is a metaphorical armor that veils the pulsating core of the self, rendering it impenetrable to the arrows of emotional affliction.

Bulletproof Hearts, 2023
4000x4000 pixel
